column3: Traffic;Two reports of different trucks crashing into different schools.------Exhibit A: ------Cassava truck hit the front of Sisophon High School in the center of Sisophon City
column5: at about 10:40 am on January 6. 2019. Students were not in school
column6: and there were no injuries.------Exhibit B:------A truck transporting heavy machinery smashed into Takhmao Secondary School on January 8
column8: near the Prek Samrong bridge in Takhmao City
